nodes.text:
Justin Mettam is a storyboard and previsualization artist for Star Wars: The Clone Wars, a CGI-based television series that debuted October 3, 2008 on Cartoon Network as a continuation of the film with the same name, released 2 months prior.
Mettam also digital effects work for Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, The Day After Tomorrow, and Sin City.
